mapper.sql: ACCOUNT_ID AS accountId, LOGIN_NAME AS loginName, LOGIN_PASSWORD AS loginPassword, USER_NAME AS userName, REAL_NAME AS realName, SEX, AGE, PIC_IMG AS picImg, STATUS, LAST_LOGIN_TIME AS lastLoginTime, LAST_LOGIN_IP AS lastLoginIp, EMAIL, TELEPHONE, CREATE_TIME AS createTime, CREATE_BY AS createBy, UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, UPDATE_BY AS updateBy
mapper.select: SELECT u.ACCOUNT_ID AS accountId, USER_NAME AS userName, REAL_NAME AS realName, SEX, AGE, PIC_IMG AS picImg, STATUS, LAST_LOGIN_TIME AS lastLoginTime, LAST_LOGIN_IP AS lastLoginIp, EMAIL, TELEPHONE, u.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, u.CREATE_BY AS createBy, UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, UPDATE_BY AS updateBy FROM tb_system_user u LEFT JOIN tb_system_user_role r ON u.ACCOUNT_ID = r.ACCOUNT_ID WHERE r.ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_system_user SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, REAL_NAME = #{realName}, SEX = #{sex}, AGE = #{age}, STATUS = #{status}, EMAIL = #{email}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy} WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}
